name: email.template,subject
src: CSI Recall Survey: ${object.name} for ${object.partner_id != False and object.partner_id.name or object.contact_name}
value: CSI Recall Survey: ${object.name} for ${object.partner_id != False and object.partner_id.name or object.contact_name}

name: email.template,body_html
src: Contract ${object.name} was live on ${object.live_date != False or ''}. It is time to send the CSI recall survey to ${(object.csi_contact.email != False and object.csi_contact.email or object.partner_id.email != False and object.partner_id.email or '')|safe}
value: Contract ${object.name} was live on ${object.live_date != False or ''}. It is time to send the CSI recall survey to ${(object.csi_contact.email != False and object.csi_contact.email or object.partner_id.email != False and object.partner_id.email or '')|safe}

name: email.template,body_html
src: Contract ${object.name} is approved for production. It is time to send the CSI survey to ${(object.csi_contact.email != False and object.csi_contact.email or object.partner_id.email != False and object.partner_id.email or '')|safe}
value: Contract ${object.name} is approved for production. It is time to send the CSI survey to ${(object.csi_contact.email != False and object.csi_contact.email or object.partner_id.email != False and object.partner_id.email or '')|safe}
